```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Attach Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

## Read in the data

```{r}
ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data","ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```
```{r}
##creating ggplot 

ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(y = domestic_enrollment , x = year_abbr)) + 
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity))
```
